auth.sign_in_description: Please enter your credentials to continue.
auth.sign_up_description: Register your account and continue to signin.
auth.account_recovery_description: Enter the email associated with your account to recover it.

features.desc01: Simulate and validate your trading strategies using historical market data across various timeframes and asset classes.
features.desc02: Stay ahead with up-to-the-minute financial news and updates from global markets.
features.desc03: Track upcoming economic releases, central bank decisions, and market-moving events for better planning.
features.desc04: Seamlessly sync with MT4/MT5 to mirror trades, import data, and manage positions from one platform.
features.desc05: Calculate lot sizes, pip values, and risk percentages based on your account balance and strategy.
features.desc06: Analyze your trade history, spot patterns, and generate detailed performance reports.

password.title: Password & Security
password.password_security_note: Make sure that your password is secure. Do not change if not necessary.

component.title: Notifications
component.description: Stay updated with the latest alerts, offers, and messages.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.desc: Make sure to change your password to a stronger

upgrade_stripe.title: Upgrade Now!
upgrade_stripe.desc: Unlock exclusive features and benefits with our premium plan. Enjoy an enhanced user experience, priority support, and more.
